title: Riot when it comes to skins

replies.body:
You people are acting like satisfying the community never brings Riot money.
And speaking of "satisfying", have you forgotten about Resistance Illaoi?

Riot went as far as to ask the community what Illaoi skin they'd like to see, then they gave us a full insight on the development process and they never stopped taking feedback untill the skin was finished.
And let's not forget the player-made skins that were brought into the game, due to high demand.
Examples: Dragonmaster Swain, Dark star Orianna, Void Fizz.

Riot DOES care about the community when it comes to skins. Just because they haven't released an Aurelion Sol skin doesn't mean they never will. I'm using him as an example, since he is mentioned every time a new skin is annuced.

Also, don't act like if Riot releases a new Aurelion Sol skin tomorrow, you people will insta-buy it. Archlight Yorick and Deathsworn Viktor weren't exactly best-sellers.
People will just move on to complaining about how another champion hasn't gotten a skin.
Because that's how our beloved Boards function.

http://www.auplod.com/u/dpoula9d885.png

Best part is that they said that A.Sol, Shen, vlad, Heim, amumu, rumble, and galio are coming and people are still up in arms,
Edit: i should leave this here so people can watch it themselves
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nd7tB99T1hY

"Yeah but since MY certain specific champ/role didnt get this skin then CLEARLY riot doesnt care about ANYONE!!!!!"

Boards - 2k4ever

"Yeah but since MY certain specific champ/role didnt get a skin with a design that only I want, then CLEARLY riot doesnt care about ANYONE!!!!!"

FIFY

I think it’s become more of a meme nowadays. I almost exclusively play forgotten champs, and my main is ASol. Honestly, at this point, I’m still gonna meme about it. It’s a meme they can’t kill due to the intrinsic nature of business.

To those who are legitimately complaining, the best things come to those who wait.

DS Ori and Void Fizz are rare af skins. They both look like shit imo.

Arclight Yorick's splash is amazing but the in-game does not live up to it. Not by a long shot.

DS Viktor looks completely out of place imo. The Halloween skins were all garbage to me. Nothing remotely spooky-themed as they're all just blue spectral-wannabe skins.
https://tenor.com/view/blues-brothers-aretha-blaspheme-no-gif-5271217

"Riot when it comes to anything"

FIFY

Yep, this ultimate was a big step down compared to Lux's based on what we've seen already. It'd need some absolutely stellar visual and sound effects to come close at this point. Plus you know people are still pissed about the bias towards ADCs, this will only help to fuel the fire.

Didn't the video literally say that they were going to be releasing GG MF at a lower price point than other ultimates specifically because it didn't push the boundaries of what skins can do? I mean, if anything that's Riot acknowledging that it's not the same quality as an ultimate skin and throwing the community a bone. If they really did care more about money than the community, GG MF would be full price regardless and we'd just get told to suck it up.

So essentially they're saying "Yeah we know this skin is actually a huge letdown but we'll only price this pile of shit for 5 less bucks because it doesn't push the boundaries and we essentially copied our own work."
Except it's not a pile of shit. It's still a pretty high quality skin no matter how you look at it. It just doesn't do anything new.
uhhh no shit fam, they are a business? skins are the gravy on top of the game (and what make rito money), so I really don't get the hate.
You think thei will go bankrupt if thei give more love to unpopular champs?

> [{quoted}](name=ThunderSkelett,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6MELEMHO,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2018-03-06T18:38:55.129+0000)
>
> You think thei will go bankrupt if thei give more love to unpopular champs?

Probably not but at the same time: "More love for unpopular champs" On the same year we got Viktor skin, Yorick Skin, Cass skin, Illaoi Skin.
"No give us the ultimate too" Im not gonna expect Riot to release an Ultimate for fucking Kled, sorry.
yes, obviously Riot will immediately accrue billions in debt.
Riot when it comes to skins: Aurelion Sol doesn't need any
A dev diary came out today saying he's gonna get one soon! :D _Finally._
What the f*ck is Aurelion Sol? A new item?
It's the company that makes poro-snax, I think.

Does no one realize that the boards and even Reddit are only a small amount of the community. Don't get me wrong, I'm pretty sad it's not a top laner but I'm guessing a large amount of the league community is fine.
that dosen't change the message of the post

I'd like a massage 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=ThunderSkelett,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6MELEMHO,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-03-06T15:33:09.319+0000)
>
> that dosen't change the massage of the post

I too enjoy massages yet I see how little they have in common with the message of this post. :^)
it would be cool if they can make an Officer Ekko skin XD I would spend money on that!!

I sure hope not. It is the ABSOLUTE opposite of what Ekko is. He is a flat out criminal. (In the sense of the lore, its justified, but still) no way in hell should he recieve an Officer Ekko skin. Even if you make the argument that Vi is a criminal, her crimes are excused, and in lore she actually works for the police. Its bad enough that we got academy Ekko when it flat out states IN HIS LORE, that he has no interest in going to school, because he thinks that rich scool kids (exactly like the academy skins) are pompous and stuck up
Just make it opposite day Ekko and have a classic blue police uniform
Academy Ekko is already opposite day ekko. They shouldnt throw something in that is absolutely contrary to what a champ should be.
Academy Ekko, is literally just Ekko in school.

"Mom, Dad." He practiced to his reflection, which stared back at him from the Z-Drive's shiny cylindrical surface. "I'm not going to apply to any of the Uppside clans or a snooty Piltie school. I'm staying here with you and my friends. I'll never turn my back on Zaun."
directly from the Ekko lore.
Ok and the academy skinline is an AU.  It is literally just a delinquent Ekko in highschool.  Nowhere near the opposite of Ekko.

then make it Contrary Ekko


also, academy ekko isn't opposite day ekko, unless u somehow explain that

"Mom, Dad." He practiced to his reflection, which stared back at him from the Z-Drive's shiny cylindrical surface. "I'm not going to apply to any of the Uppside clans or a snooty Piltie school. I'm staying here with you and my friends. I'll never turn my back on Zaun." directly from the Ekko lore.
In Academy Ekko hes a delinquent...

Personally, I think the skin is fine for what it is. 

My issue is more with the name and the timing of the drop.  Seriously... "Gun Goddess" Miss Fortune?   

It just feels like a particularly tone deaf moment to release a skin that *literally* glorifies guns. 

Couldn't wait a couple of months to roll in the money?  Or maybe rename the skin so it's more about her tech or the thematic elements and less about the MuthaFukkin guns. One suggestion... Mecha Miss Fortune. Suits the skin fine and fits her into a current skin theme. GG.
I can't agree with you at all. not after you put the idea for "MUTHAFUKKIN GUNS! Miss Fortune" skin into my head.
Fuck off dude it's just to make it sound SATISFYING to purchase, that's it. You're completely overthinking it......
im more pissed at the zoe skin. the bitch just got released and they give her a skin. Meanwhile, fuck kled and camille
I agree, they could've decided she will get a Pool Party skin and leave it at that so they can finish it when skins for older champions that need them much more get released.

Yeah! Clearly Ezreal should have gotten it!

He only has 1 ultimate skin! ONLY 1 WTF!
hell, i hope they dont make money off the skin
MF has a 2.70% playrate , I bet all her 10 players are gonna buy that skin and Rito knew that lol
You do realize that having 2.7% among 140 champs and 100 millions players is actually a lot, don't you?
Cause all of those 2.70% will buy the skin lul

> [{quoted}](name=PePsiLemoNN,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6MELEMHO,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2018-03-07T12:28:41.355+0000)
>
> Cause all of those 2.70% will buy the skin lul

Okay where are you getting this 2.7%? Have you check her play rates in silver/bronze, where she is played the most? (Also roughly 55%-60% of players there too.) if you are using opgg it won't do different elos, only diamond or higher. Go check champgg. You can check every elo. Then look at her play rate there.
Yep , forgot about the plat+ thing lol , got used to it.
You do realize it really isnt, dont you?  Even unpopular champs generally maintain 5%.
You do know they generally lose money on Ultimates right?
